body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarSpark customer support. My name is Paul Reed. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Paul, my name is Betty Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Betty. Could you kindly provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's January nine, one nine eight five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Betty. Now, could you share your phone number with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five five five, three two one, four three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for sharing that information, Betty. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's it. I'm feeling excited about the new CarSpark model I just purchased.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to hear that, Betty. Thank you for contacting us today. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
